DOC.brief_title: Promoting Health Healthy Living Centres - Clinical Study Among Children
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator intend perform control clinical trial intervention systemic level . The target group overweight obese child 6 10 year old , parent , community administrator public health nurse . The overall aim evaluate familybased intervention , target overweight obese child parent , long-term positive effect weight development child . The alternative hypothesis zero hypothesis child overweight obesity participate parent , completion six month intervention long term follow ( 2 year ) reduce BMI-for-age z-score ( Iso-BMI ) . The behavioral model educational strategy tailor ( age , gender etc . ) include general information practical learning session . The program offer guide active play , define spontaneous gross locomotor movement child engage amuse occupy . Parents attend workshop intend increase knowledge awareness family structure , healthy eat habit practical suggestion implement healthy behavior everyday life . Parents educate use strategy home , support child improve behavior . This community base study support local leadership collaboration locally base sport club . The primary outcome variable , child BMI-for-age z-score measure referral , inclusion , 6 month , 1 2 year post intervention . Secondary outcome variable , measure inclusion end intervention , child activity pattern , screen view time , eat habit , sleep pattern body composition well parent BMI , body composition , exercise habit , perception health , experience parenthood level parental stress . Physical activity level well sleep duration -quality record use biaxial accellerometers . A validated food diary use . The participant also ask complete questionnaire include question screen view time , self-perceived healt , sleep pattern ( child ) perceive autonomy support autonomous regulation ( parent ) .
DOC.criteria: IsoBMI > 25 , able participate activity group Children unable participate activity group , parent able participate group base individual counseling
